Recommendations: 1. The College may revisit and review the objectives of the Nursing program to possibly include the aesthetic and cultural values as one of the important components of the curricular program.

2. The conduct of a research study on the level of VMGO awareness and acceptability may be done until the external stakeholders have fully understood them by utilizing other media such as television and enhancing the on-air radio, for wider dissemination.
3. Good educational practices and the implementation of planned activities towards the ultimate goal of attaining the university vision and the goals and objectives of the program may be sustained.
